item.title: Join our next hike on February 12th and 13th, 2022
item.description: The plan We will hike along the Mosel river. We will start from Konz, stop overnight in Trier, then hike to Schweich. The details of the route from Konz to Trier is avalable here. The details of the route from Trier to Schweich is available here. Both are about 20km. Join us! Lunch stop TBD The terrain may be wet and muddy, so we’ll all need good waterproof shoes and clothes.

item.title: Join our next hike on November 20th, 2021
item.description: Update We completed this hike. Here is a video of our adventure! The plan For this hike, we will start from Hagen and walk towards Dusseldorf. You will have a choice to hike: 25 km by stopping at the Schwelm Hbf: Route on Komoot GPX 50 km by stopping at the Wuppertal Hbf Route on Komoot GPX 100 km by going all the way to Dusseldorf Route on Komoot GPX Join us!
